extendedInfo.description: DishPointer Pro: Point your phone towards the sky to see on the live camera screen where the satellites are, any line of sight (LoS) issues and the look angles. Couldn't be easier to install your sat dish with this augmented reality satellite finder.*** 14 day money back guarantee, hassle-free ***+ SCREEN Capture: show your customers no line of sight issues, save it to the sd card or email it to back office. + Works with all geostationary satellites+ Works everywhere around the world+ No Internet access needed to operate it (occasionally it is required)+ Add, edit and delete satellites+ Select favorite satellites+ Azimuth, elevation and skew results As reviewed and mentioned by***** Wall Street Journal***** NewsWeek***** BusinessWeek***** TELE-Satellite Award Winner***** Engadget and many many moreAs one pro puts it: "DishPointer pro is invaluable, gets the job done in half the time".

reviews.title: DishFinder Pro
reviews.comment: Have used this app for installations both in the UK and France. Apart from an upgrade problem which was quickly sorted out by Infinity, it has been spot on. It also helped to identify a reception problem (a tree branch that had grown across the line of sight - quickly resolved). Recommended.
reviews.author: Terry Middlemiss

reviews.title: DishPointer Pro
reviews.comment: I tried several \"free\" apps before buying this one.  Definitely worth it.  DishPointer is very simple to use.  Check just the satellites you want to see and the app saves them so you don\'t have to scroll thru hundreds of satellites to find the one(s) you want each time you run the app.  Huge when setting up a dish - its time consuming enough!  Highly recommend!
reviews.author: James Lee

reviews.title: Dish Pointer Pro on Samsung S4
reviews.comment: I work at a Satellite Earth Station in Ireland and use Dish Pointer Pro to \'see\' the Geostationary Arc. It is a very useful aid to my work.  I recently upgraded my mobile phone to Samsung S4, and the extra shipped S-View cover caused the app to not work correctly. Please be advised that this cover interferes with the phone\'s compass. It would be best to use the normal plastic cover that comes attached to the rear of the phone by the manufacturer, when using the Dish Pointer Pro App.   I have found the Dish Pointer App to be the best of its kind and I recommend it highly.  Denis
reviews.author: Denis Daly

reviews.title: good but
reviews.comment: This app works ok but the biggest problem is the sat move around which is not good. Also if your in a remote area without cell service it will over about a week not work due to not being able to authorize the account. I mean I paid for this and it stops working because they reauthorize it almost weekly??
reviews.author: Ned Baringer

reviews.title: Dish pointer pro
reviews.comment: This app works perfect on droid razr maxx. Use it everyday as a dish network technician. I have to say it is spot on.
reviews.author: Lori Mckay

reviews.title: Avision
reviews.comment: It is great but does have a glitches. Some times it freezes up and there has been a few times it will not show the satellite that I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didnt work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work like it shows in video want money back
reviews.author: blakely may

reviews.title: Great program
reviews.comment: Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
reviews.comment: This is a great application but I would like to see the ability to pinch zoom and audio alerts on satellite lock.  Highly Recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs fixed
reviews.comment: Needs bug update for droid x2 no matter where u put the phone the sat doesnt move
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Auto closes
reviews.comment: App closes immediately after closing. No support for product.
reviews.author: jodie adair

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Poor
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Use it everyday.not perfect but i don\'t even use my inclinometer anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uh, get the labels to lay out horizontally according to device orientation, currently they stay vertical.\tAndroid OS ALLOWS NO SCREEN CAPS! Tnx 4 xplaining permz! Markt lic check done OFFline, network not needed. INCREASE LIC CHK TIMEOUT & allow 4 net wifi, google\'s new licensing? Does NOT require ANY checks more than one or two. Never had a requirement for 12 days or whatever, thats YOUR CHOICE, and a bad one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must Have
reviews.comment: Using it installing Dish, Direct, Hughes, Exede-Wildblue and commercial systems. Great for showing customers LOS problems. problems are no different then using  even the best compass. Stay away from metal and triple check everything.( I still use my compass). Thanks Alan, Great App. Kev
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: Perfect just stay away from metal. I have found that accuracy starts to fail within 10 feet of metal. Like a car or the dish. And keep compass calibrated!! Good app makes my job so easy Ken- Dish network
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless in the bush.
reviews.comment: First the good. A great tool for easily finding any satellite. Just pick the sat and line it up over your camera\'s view. Very slick.  BUT if you don\'t have an internet connection you\'re screwed. It checks for a license every 5 days. Completely useless for setting up a satellite terminal in a remote location without internet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not impresses
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work for me. I tried for hours tweaking this out. Never even a blip of a signal. Then downloaded a free app and nailed it first time. Save you money. Wish I could get mine back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but you need an internet conection
reviews.comment: I install VSAT in Afghanistan and this app is perfect for site assessments. But in order for the app to work you can\'t be away from an internet connection for more than a few days without getting an error message about needing to sync with Google before being able to use the app. Which means for remote sites you\'re pretty much not able to use this app until after you install the satellite and get the internet working. This needs fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Helps to locate dishes to aid installation.
reviews.author: A Google User
